model.name: APAC_Customers_VBL
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW account ( AccountId long NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CustID string(12) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), AccountType string(10) OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), AccountStatus string(10) OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), DATEOPENED timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'DATETIME', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), DATECLOSED timestamp OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'DATETIME', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(AccountId) ) AS SELECT convert(APAC_Customers.account.AccountId, long) AS AccountId, APAC_Customers.account.CustID, APAC_Customers.account.AccountType, APAC_Customers.account.AccountStatus, APAC_Customers.account.DATEOPENED, APAC_Customers.account.DATECLOSED FROM APAC_Customers.account;

model.name: Customers
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW account ( AccountId long NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CustID string(12) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), AccountType string(10) OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), AccountStatus string(10) OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), DATEOPENED timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'DATETIME', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), DATECLOSED timestamp OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'DATETIME', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(AccountId) ) AS SELECT * FROM APAC_Customers_VBL.account UNION ALL SELECT * FROM US_Customers_VBL.account;

model.name: US_Customers
US_Customers_VBL
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW account ( AccountID long NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), SSN string(12) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), AccountType string(10) OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), AccountStatus string(10) OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), DATEOPENED timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'DATETIME', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), DATECLOSED timestamp OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'DATETIME', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(AccountID) ) AS SELECT convert(US_Customers.account.AccountID, long) AS AccountID, US_Customers.account.SSN, US_Customers.account.AccountType, US_Customers.account.AccountStatus, US_Customers.account.DATEOPENED, US_Customers.account.DATECLOSED FROM US_Customers.account;
